snippet.title: Unsung Empires: The Cholas - Launch Trailer - PC - Tamil
snippet.description:
Unsung Empire: The Cholas is a single-player narrative-driven 3D action-adventure game developed by Ayelet Studio featuring sword-based combat and platforming elements. Players traverse a variety of environments, moving through forests, cities, caves, and wilderness to advance through the game's story. Utilizing swords, engaging in melee combat, and employing stealth are key to overcoming hostile enemies. For most of the game, players take on the role of Rajendra Chola — the Tamil Chola emperor of South India who succeeded his father, Rajaraja Chola I, and ascended to the throne in 1025 CE. The prologue follows his journey of overseas conquest, where the Chola Navy crossed the ocean and launched an attack on the Srivijaya kingdom of Sangrama Vijayatungavarman. 

Music composed and arranged by Chandar Karunakaran

Rajendra Chola voiced by Dude Vicky

Director: Abraham K
Producer: Mohanraj K
3D Generalist: Sudharshan
Game Programmers: Punithan R, Vinnava S
Animator: Om Sanas
QA Specialist: Manish Tak
Concept Artist: Dennis Praveen
Programming Help: Yuvraj & Manivannan
Marketing & Community Outreach: Tapasya B
Trailer cut: Joshua
Dialogues: Prakash

PLAY NOW
https://ayelet.studio/steam

VISIT GAME SITE
https://unsungempires.com

FOLLOW AYELET STUDIO: 
https://ayelet.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/aphSXHHj5H
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ayeletstudio/
X Platform (Twitter): https://twitter.com/StudioAyelet
LinkedIn: https://in.linkedin.com/company/ayelet-studio

JOIN AYELET STUDIO:
careers@ayelet.studio
